LanguageData.BallistaBolts.label: ballista bolts
LanguageData.BallistaBolts.description: A simple, yet very deadly, ammunition used in mannable ballista turrets.
LanguageData.Bullet_Shell_AntiArmor.label: anti-armor cannon shell
LanguageData.Bullet_Shell_HighExCannon.label: high-explosive cannon shell
LanguageData.Dwarven_SummonAutomatons.label: scroll of dwarves "Summon Automatons"
LanguageData.Dwarven_SummonAutomatons.description: An advanced dwarven device that can teach any pawn with a dark constitution gene the summon ballista ability.
LanguageData.Dwarven_SummonBallista.label: scroll of dwarves "Summon Ballista"
LanguageData.Dwarven_SummonBallista.description: An advanced dwarven device that can teach any pawn with a dark constitution gene the summon ballista ability.
LanguageData.GatlingAmmoBox.label: gatling ammo box
LanguageData.GatlingAmmoBox.description:
A metal box full of readily-made ammunition used in mannable gatling turrets.
Caution! Very explosive!
LanguageData.ScrollShadowWalker_CorruptChi.label: scroll of shadows "Corrupt Chi"
LanguageData.ScrollShadowWalker_CorruptChi.descriptio: An advanced archotech device that can teach any pawn with a dark constitution gene the corrupt chi ability.
LanguageData.ScrollShadowWalker_CrowsLeap.label: scroll of shadows "Crow's Leap"
LanguageData.ScrollShadowWalker_CrowsLeap.description: An advanced archotech device that can teach any pawn with a dark constitution gene the crow's leap ability.
LanguageData.ScrollShadowWalker_DarkKnife.label: scroll of shadows "Dark Knife"
LanguageData.ScrollShadowWalker_DarkKnife.description: An advanced archotech device that can teach any pawn with a dark constitution gene the dark knife ability.
LanguageData.ScrollShadowWalker_DarkMine.label: scroll of shadows "Dark Mine"
LanguageData.ScrollShadowWalker_DarkMine.description: An advanced archotech device that can teach any pawn with a dark constitution gene the dark mine ability.
LanguageData.ScrollShadowWalker_DarkShuriken.label: scroll of shadows "Dark Shuriken"
LanguageData.ScrollShadowWalker_DarkShuriken.descript: An advanced archotech device that can teach any pawn with a dark constitution gene the dark shuriken ability.
LanguageData.ScrollShadowWalker_DarkSpear.label: scroll of shadows "Dark Spear"
LanguageData.ScrollShadowWalker_DarkSpear.description: An advanced archotech device that can teach any pawn with a dark constitution gene the dark spear ability.
LanguageData.ScrollShadowWalker_PhantomOfDeath.label: scroll of shadows "Phantom Of Death"
LanguageData.ScrollShadowWalker_PhantomOfDeath.descri: An advanced archotech device that can teach any pawn with a dark constitution gene the phantom of death ability.
LanguageData.ScrollShadowWalker_SummonDecoy.label: scroll of shadows "Summon Decoy"
LanguageData.ScrollShadowWalker_SummonDecoy.descripti: An advanced archotech device that can teach any pawn with a dark constitution gene the summon decoy ability.
LanguageData.Shell_AntiArmorCannon.label: anti-armor cannon shell
LanguageData.Shell_AntiArmorCannon.description: A specially-grade cannon shell made by the hunters workshop. Although it deals less damage, it can inflict enemies under a 10.9 explosion radius with armor bane.
LanguageData.Shell_HighExplosiveCannon.label: high-explosive cannon shell
LanguageData.Shell_HighExplosiveCannon.description: An explosive shell used by the mannable cannon turret.
LanguageData.SimpleComponent.label: daedalus components
LanguageData.SimpleComponent.description: A collection of gears and complicated mechanical components which are used to craft multiple equipments, and build wonderful low-tech contraptions.
LanguageData.VisceralSolution.label: visceral solution
LanguageData.VisceralSolution.description: A syrup-like substance made from brain matter. Exclusively manufactured from the hunter's workshop as a main ingredient for their combat potions.
